  <p> <strong> 1. Engage Actively:</strong> Participants are expected to actively engage in discussions, activities, and exercises. This includes asking questions, sharing experiences, and contributing ideas to enhance collective learning.</p>
  
 <p> <strong> 2. Respect All Contributions:</strong>  Every participant’s input is valuable. Listen attentively, respect differing opinions, and provide constructive feedback to create a supportive learning environment.
 </p>
